posts.postText:
So, I just tried to join TTT, and this popped up, in a flickering dialogue box: Kicked by Console : LightningAC VIOLATION # SETHHACK. 

My copy of GMod is legit, and Kry can vouch for this. 
I don't have anything strange in my GMod folder, in fact, I recently reinstalled after a major Steam error.
I don't hack; I think that much should be obvious.
What the hell is going on?

Halp?
We'll look into this. Did it only happen once?

No, it's done this multiple times.
I've just reinstalled again, going from an absolutely clean garrysmod folder, and it's giving me the exact same message.
What type of computer do you have.

>> What type of computer do you have. 
He's already said he has a mac.

>> >> What type of computer do you have. 
He's already said he has a mac. 
 I heard storm figured out that problem with the mac, so it should be fixed soon.
It has been fixed as of yesterday.
